thread.section_title: Sim, as mulheres estão tatuando sardas! – ESTILO
thread.title: Sim, as mulheres estão tatuando sardas!
thread.title_full: Sim, as mulheres estão tatuando sardas!

author: Elisa Duarte
title: Sim, as mulheres estão tatuando sardas!
text:
Até onde uma tendência de beleza pode chegar? As sardas voltaram ao spotlight com o retorno da beleza natural. Quer dizer, mascarar as sardas foi ficando cada vez mais fora de moda. Até Kendall Jenner, adepta do make pesado, postou uma foto para mostrar suas sardinhas.

A post shared by Kendall (@kendalljenner) on Apr 26, 2015 at 9:28am PDT 
Aqui, Gisele ensina como ressaltar as sardas naturais depois de aplicar a base:
Vieram os adesivos de sardas falsas . E finalmente, ( ou não!?) as pessoas começaram a tatuar sardas. 
 
Lil shout out to some people who have done wonderful things to my face. @missmelissatattooer for my wonderful #tattooedfreckles to @sydneydyercosmetics for my beautiful #tattooedeyebrows and to @piercerdan for my #septumpiercing and my #philtrum thanks so much guys for making me feel the most beautiful!! 
A post shared by Rebecca Martin (@missrebeccajane_13) on Sep 8, 2016 at 9:11am PDT 
Anoche me "tatué" algunas pecas (yo misma)! Sin máquina de tatuaje, método manual y sin NADA de dolor. Se aclaran en color al sanar! Menos es más, así siempre se puede agregar más a gusto. Es método semi permanente por lo que se borran en 1 año a prox. Para los que no saben estoy Certificada en Microblading y tengo experiencia en tiendas de Tattoo como asistente. Me encantaron!! Y espero poder comenzar a trabajar nuevamente cuando mis labores de madre me lo permitan! #tatuajecosmetico #pecastatuadas (ps: Si no le gusta, ahorre su opinion para usted. Los comentarios negativos seran borrados y bloqueados. Gracias) //………………………………………………….// "Tattooed" some freckles on myself last night! Hand method, no machine, no pain AT ALL! Super fast. Let's see how they heal. Less is always more, so you can always add more in the future. They will fade in lighter color as they heal. For those who don't know, I'm a certified Microblading artist and I got years experience working in tattoo shop as assistant also. Hopefully I can start working again soon!! When my #maternityduties let me!! #handmethod #cosmetictattoo #tattooedfreckles #pmu (ps: negative comments will be erased. If you dont like it, save your opinion for yourself or will be blocked. Thank you) 
A post shared by Ivy (@ivy.pj) on Feb 18, 2017 at 6:19am PST 
When I get asked what my favourite tattoo is I always say my freckles. Thanks @missmelissatattooer for making me feel the most beautiful and the most like myself #tattooedfreckles #facetattoos #ouch 
A post shared by Rebecca Martin (@missrebeccajane_13) on Dec 2, 2016 at 4:47pm PST 
Here are some HEALED freckles on this cutie who already had fabulous eyebrows and some light freckles but wanted a few more prominent ones! We added a couple more after taking this photo. If you're interested in getting freckles tattooed, please email me at tweddle.tattoo@gmail.com. To check availability or book an appointment call @adornedtattoovancity. #vancouver #vancouvertattoo #vancouverstyle #vancouverfashion #vancouverbeauty #cosmetictattoo #cosmetictattooing #permanentmakeup #semipermanentmakeup #freckletattoo #freckles #tattooedfreckles #healedfreckles #awkwardwatermark 
A post shared by Brianne Tweddle (@btweddle) on Sep 5, 2016 at 8:37pm PDT 
– Quantas tatuagens você tem?
– 25 só no rosto!
